long_description: The Paddle Hugger Paddle Holder mounts to your stand up paddleboard and holds your paddle so you don't have to. Paddle Hugger Paddle Holder sticks to your board using strong adhesive strips from 3M, and it features soft foam construction that is both tough and pliable. Stick to the wall for an easy way to store your paddle when not in use. Package of 2 secures a single paddle. Fits all major brand paddle shafts.
short_description: The Paddle Hugger Paddle Holder mounts to your stand up paddleboard and holds your paddle so you don't have to.
